readable.title: 2883907436_82bf4a36b8
readable.content: A homeless man stands in the street with a black dog . A man and a dog , with a shopping cart full of items . An old man and his dog are standing otuside with a cart . An old man with a large belly is next to a filled shopping cart and a dog on the street . A scruffy fat man is standing next to a dog and a shopping cart full of stuff .
